divs: sighting detailson sunday, nov. 23, 2008 i was driving west on the pennsylvania turnpike from the willow grove exit to the downingtown exit. between the valley forge\king of prussia exit and downingtown (approximately 13 miles of highway) i saw 7 different ufos that looked the same as each other. they looked like the ones i reported last week. each one was the shape of a trapezoid with rounded edges, with 2 bright "headlights" and a dull green light on one back corner and a dull red light on the other back corner. tonight, the red and green lights were pulsing. 7:02 pm mile marker 325 moving right to left across turnpike (south). i passed directly underneath the object as it moved. it was quite slow- maybe 20 miles an hour. 7:05 mm322 didn't note where it was moving 7:08 mm319 ufo to the left (south) of the turnpike. saw it at the same time i was seeing the next one. this one was near mile marker 319. 7:08 mm320 ufo a little to the left (south) of the turnpike\crossing over (heading north), higher up than the others, moving to right. i could see this one when i was at mile marker 319, but it was physically closer to mile marker 320. 7:10 mm317\yellow springs road this ufo was at mile marker 317, where yellow springs road crosses over the turnpike. the ufo was just north of the turnpike. 7:12 mm317 it was to the right (north) of turnpike, moving parallel w\turnpike but heading east. 7:14 mm312\downingtown exit to the right (north) of turnpike, heading east.
Summary: Saw 7 UFOs in a 12 minute window while on PA turnpike
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in King of Prussia
There were no other sightings in King of Prussia on or around November 23rd 2008
